s1899: Twenty-three. Qin pulled our Jiang Pang rebelled against Qin.
s1905: Two. Qin pulled our two cities, army under Da Liang, Han came to rescue, made peace with Qin at Wen.
s1906: Twenty-one. Bao Yuan rescued Wei, defeated by Qin, fled to Kai Feng.
s1914: Three. Qin pulled our four cities, beheaded forty thousand.
s1922: Thirty-four. Bai Qi struck Wei Hua Yang army, Mang Mao fled, got three Jin generals, beheaded one hundred fifty thousand.
s1923: Four. Made peace with Qin at Nan Yang.
s1933: Han Huan Hui Wang first year
s1935: Twenty-seven. Struck Yan. Lu Qing Gong first year.
s1943: Twenty-eight. Lin Xiang Ru attacked Qi, reached Ping Yi.
s1945: Yan Wu Cheng Wang first year
s1951: Three. Qin struck our Yan Yu city, not pulled.
s1952: Twenty-nine. Qin attacked Han Yan Yu. Zhao She led struck Qin, greatly defeated them, granted title Ma Fu.
s1955: Fourteen. Qin, Chu struck our Gang Shou.
s1968: Nine. Qin pulled our Huai city.
s1976: Forty. Crown prince hostage in Wei died, returned burial Zhi Yang.
s1986: Eleven. Qin pulled our Lin Qiu.
s1994: Forty-two. Xuan Tai Hou died. An Guo Jun became crown prince.
s1997: Zhao Xiao Cheng Wang first year. Qin pulled our three cities. Ping Yuan Jun chancellor.
s1999: Seven. Qi Tian Dan pulled Zhong Yang.
s2005: Nine. Qin pulled our Xing. Built Feng Pang city.
s2012: Forty-four. (Qin) attacked Han, took Nan Yang.
s2014: Ten. Qin struck our Tai Xing.
s2021: Forty-five. (Qin) attacked Han, took ten cities.
s2025: Chu Kao Lie Wang first year. Qin took our Zhou. Huang Xie became chancellor.
s2030: Forty-six. King went to Nan Zheng.
s2033: Five. Sent Lian Po to resist Qin at Chang Ping.
s2039: Forty-seven. Bai Qi broke Zhao at Chang Ping, killed soldiers four hundred fifty thousand.
s2042: Six. Sent Zhao Kuo to replace Lian Po to lead. Bai Qi broke Kuo forty-five thousand.
s2066: Fifty. Wang Yin, Zheng An Ping besieged Han Dan, and Yin returned army, pulled Xin Zhong.
s2067: Twenty. Gong Zi Wu Ji rescued Han Dan, Qin army withdrew.
s2069: Nine. Qin besieged our Han Dan, Chu, Wei rescued us.
s2070: Six. Chun Shen Jun rescued Zhao.
s2076: Twenty-one. Han, Wei, Chu rescued Zhao Xin Zhong, Qin army stopped.
s2077: Seventeen. Qin struck our Yang Cheng, rescued Zhao Xin Zhong.
s2084: Fifty-two.. Took Xi Zhou. Wang Ji executed in market.
s2088: Eight. Took Lu, Lu jun enfeoffed at Ju.
s2112: Twenty-five. Wei Yuan Jun first year.
s2124: Twelve. Zhu Guo Jing Bo died.
s2125: Four. Attacked Zhao, Zhao broke our army, killed Li Fu.
s2129: Qin Xiao Wen Wang first year.
s2138: Qin Zhuang Xiang Wang Chu first year.. Meng Ao took Cheng Gao, Xing Yang. First established San Chuan jun. Lu Bu Wei chancellor. Took Dong Zhou.
s2140: Twenty-four. Qin pulled our Cheng Gao, Xing Yang.
